website_summaries.verdict: HP's inventive two-in-one hybrid is fun to use and show off, but its ambitious hinge design can get in the way at times.
pros: An excellent, premium-looking design with a leather outer shell over a metal frame
Good stylus response and excellent battery life
cons: The rotating hinge design is too fiddly for its own good and the dual-core processor is a letdown for this price range
The stylus has nowhere to live, except in an awkward leather loop hanging from the side

customer_reviews.title: Great Convertible and Impressive Design
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive piece of technology when sitting in a meeting...take notes, show others items you are working on, and the looks it gets are priceless. I also love this laptop/tablet on the couch. Easily switch from laptop to tablet mode and get stuff done in comfort. Would be nice if the angle of the screen in laptop mode had more flexibility, but it works well just the same. I have used this for more intensive programs like Photoshop and Premiere, and it works well (gets a little warm but all laptops do with those programs). I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: Sexiest Basic Laptop Out There
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the most spec’d out computer on the planet. So if you’re a gamer, look elsewhere. However, if you just use your laptop for basics and school, this folio is a step above the competition. This model has been out for a couple years already, but the wow factor is still there. In a world full of Apple, dare to be the orange. I mean, the friggin chassis is made of leather, like, real leather. It’s a cool machine, and the pen comes in the box. Most importantly, when it converts to tablet mode, the keyboard isn’t on the back. That’s really the whole reason I bought it, personally.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Francisco Garibay

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: What a stylish and lightweight unit. Love using this one more than any computer I’ve had at any point. My only complaint might be that the touchpad could be a little less touchy but that may just be a learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great form factor
customer_reviews.text: Great form look and feel. The battery life is amazing and it's great for a daily grinder that uses the basics productivity apps. It remains much cooler than any laptop I've ever had and it's quite. It's not the fastest and the processor is a dual core.
customer_reviews.author: One who lives

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. It's a little sluggish at first but speeds up. Light, responsive and looks great! Traded my surface for this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived DOA. After talking to tech support it was determined the laptop was junk. Had to return for full refund. Won't be buying another one. Stay clear of this model. May look sleek, but it's junk.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorGuy1

customer_reviews.title: Good but price range is a little high.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. Like the leather and the way the keyboard feels to the fingers. I only had the issue of shipment which was resolved very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: quesar kelly

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: O love the gist my husband gave me. The picture is very nice great quality and it looks so elegant with the brown case that protects the laptop. So many way to use it. I’m so in love w it
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, sexy, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, sexy and powerful. I love my new HP Spectre! Wish the leather-bound folio style came with the 128gb hard drive!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The item came as described, I love the leather feel and smell! I love the functionality and the positions between the laptop and the tab, very practical and the price was reasonable! Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Kurwat

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase So Far
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about three months ago, and it's been great so far. No complaints, great battery life, fast and responsive. No real bugs, I can use it all day without charging. In fact, I even bought a second one to be my dad's first laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well made, performs very well.
customer_reviews.text: 2 in one option. Very nice leather cover. Intel core i7 - 8GB Memory and 256 Solid State Hard Drive and very reasonable price for all you get with this laptop. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RBS Texas

customer_reviews.title: A trendy, silent and efficient laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love the way people always get taken aback when they see my laptop closed. It gives a perfect folio feel and is SO silent! I bought it a 14 months ago and it still works like it is new. Just 1 small hiccup when I first used it for video chat - the microphone malfunctioned and now I have to use headphones while calling every time. It wouldn't have been different because I love my ear buds while calling (maybe a separate review for that!).
customer_reviews.author: Mohit Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for about a month and love it so far. The battery life is insane. Watched a movie on it three days in a row and it didn't die. The part that holds the stylus to the laptop broke after a week but HP replaced it as soon as I asked. I love the feel and the look and the way it folds (you dont accidentally hit keys when it is in tablet mode like most 360 laptops). So far it's fast and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, light laptop but...
customer_reviews.text: This Laptop is great and is good for traveling, however the leather is not durable. I care for the leather as per the instructions and the edges seem to wear off easily and the plastic lining comes out of the laptop. Other than this, the laptop has great performance and the touch screen is very responsive. Just sad to see a laptop this expenisive has poor leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremih

customer_reviews.title: Involves slaughtering an animal
customer_reviews.text: Leave it to HP to make a laptop that requires killing an animal and peeling it's skin off. There was a time when I liked HP. This is 2020, HP... wake up.
customer_reviews.author: dave the vegan
